code: import{reverseMapping}from'./tools';var emojis={'THUMBS_UP':'👍','THUMBS_DOWN':'👎','LAUGH':'😄','HOORAY':'🎉','CONFUSED':'😕','HEART':'❤️','ROCKET':'🚀','EYES':'👀'};export var getEmojiByName=function getEmojiByName(emojiName){return emojis[emojiName]||'';};export var getNameByEmoji=function getNameByEmoji(emoji){return reverseMapping(emojis)[emoji]||'';};
